PFUWorkflow 0.2.6

    Save the PSUT target in a pinboard.

    release_psut.Rd

    Releases (release = TRUE) or not (relase = FALSE) a new version of the PSUT target using the pins package.

    release_psut(
  pipeline_releases_folder,
  targ,
  targ_name,
  type = "rds",
  release = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    pipeline_releases_folder

    The folder that contains the pinboard for releases from the pipeline.

    targ

    The target object to be saved to the pinboard.

    targ_name

    The name of the target object.

    type

    The type of the target. Default is "rds".

    release

    A boolean telling whether to do a release. Default is FALSE.

    Value

    If release is TRUE, the fully-qualified path name of the targ file in the pinboard. If release is FALSE, NULL.

    Details

    Released versions of the PSUT target can be obtained as shown in examples.

    Examples

    if (FALSE) {
# Establish the pinboard
pinboard <- pins::board_folder("~/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/PipelineReleases/")
# Get information about the `PSUT` target in the pinboard
pinboard %>%
  pins::pin_meta(name = "psut")
# Find versions of the `PSUT` target
pinboard %>%
  pins::pin_versions(name = "psut")
# Get the latest copy of the `PSUT` target.
my_psut <- pinboard %>%
  pins::pin_read(name = "psut")
# Retrieve a previous version of the `PSUT` target.
my_old_psut <- pinboard %>%
  pins::pin_read(name = "psut", version = "20220218T023112Z-1d9e1")}
